price: Na wao wakamgeuzia uso, na wakasema: Huyu amefunzwa, naye ni mwendawazimu.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ
footnotes: Kisha wakaacha kumsadiki Mtume aliye tiliwa nguvu na miujiza iliyo wazi, na wakamwambia: Huo uwongo na uzushi! Mara nyengine wakimsingizia kuwa amefunzwa hayo na mtu, na mara nyengine kuwa akili yake imekorogeka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
